A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILER ALERT: This movie is at best just a stand-alone Star Wars movie..it ruins the Star Wars Mythos. I don’t know why Rian Johnson decided to go this direction...OH WAIT! I know why!! Cuz he’s in charge of writing another new trilogy that has nothing to do with these characters!! Thanks for ruining the original Star Wars!! And ruining JJ Abrams vision!! What a selfish director
